clinical_history: Limb swelling, rule out deep venous thrombosis.
technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Gallbladder shows unremarkable, no stones or wall thickening.
Right ovary shows mildly heterogeneous appearance.
Prostate is well-defined; volume approximately 1.55 cc.
Liver appears ill-defined with no focal lesions.
Major vessels show normal waveform on Doppler.
Right kidney demonstrates unremarkable, no hydronephrosis.
Testes are normal with normal vascularity.
Placenta is unremarkable and normally located.
